abstract: Asks the delegate to specify the interface orientations that the split view controller supports.
overview:
## Return Value

The orientations that you want the specified split view controller to support. The value you return can be one or more of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIInterfaceOrientationMask] constants.

## Discussion

The split view controller calls this method to obtain the orientations that it supports. You can use this method to alter the set of orientations typically supported by a split view controller. If you don’t implement this method, the split view controller supports all orientations on iPad and all but the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIInterfaceOrientationMask/allButUpsideDown] orientation on iPhone devices.

# splitViewControllerSupportedInterfaceOrientations(_:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the delegate to specify the interface orientations that the split view controller supports.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func splitViewControllerSupportedInterfaceOrientations(_ splitViewController: UISplitViewController) -> UIInterfaceOrientationMask
```

## Parameters

- **splitViewController**: The split view controller.

## Return Value

The orientations that you want the specified split view controller to support. The value you return can be one or more of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIInterfaceOrientationMask] constants.

## Discussion

The split view controller calls this method to obtain the orientations that it supports. You can use this method to alter the set of orientations typically supported by a split view controller. If you don’t implement this method, the split view controller supports all orientations on iPad and all but the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIInterfaceOrientationMask/allButUpsideDown] orientation on iPhone devices.

## Related Documentation

- **supportedInterfaceOrientations**: The interface orientations that the view controller supports.

## Specifying the interface orientations

- **splitViewControllerPreferredInterfaceOrientationForPresentation(_:)**: Asks the delegate for the orientation to use when presenting the split view controller.
